verses.verse: Wherefore <S%H199><s%>, I-yov <S%H347><s%>, I pray thee, hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my speeches <S%H4405><s%>, and hearken <S%H238><s%> <S%H8685><s%> to all my words <S%H1697><s%>.
Behold, now I have opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, my tongue <S%H3956><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> in my mouth <S%H2441><s%>.

My words <S%H561><s%> shall be of the uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%>: and my lips <S%H8193><s%> shall utter <S%H4448><s%> <S%H8765><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> clearly <S%H1305><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.
The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> hath made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me, and the breath <S%H5397><s%> of 'El SHaddai <S%H7706><s%> hath given me life <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.
If thou canst <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> answer <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> me, set thy words in order <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8798><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, stand up <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8690><s%>.
Behold, I am according to thy wish <S%H6310><s%> in 'Elohim's <S%H410><s%> stead: I also am formed <S%H7169><s%> <S%H8795><s%> out of the clay <S%H2563><s%>.
Behold, my terror <S%H367><s%> shall not make thee afraid <S%H1204><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, neither shall my hand <S%H405><s%> be heavy <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon thee.
Surely thou hast spoken <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in mine hearing <S%H241><s%>, and I have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thy words <S%H4405><s%>, saying,
I am clean <S%H2134><s%> without transgression <S%H6588><s%>, I am innocent <S%H2643><s%>; neither is there iniquity <S%H5771><s%> in me.
Behold, he findeth <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> occasions <S%H8569><s%> against me, he counteth <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me for his enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>,
He putteth <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in the stocks <S%H5465><s%>, he marketh <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all my paths <S%H734><s%>.
Behold, in this thou art not just <S%H6663><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: I will answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, that 'Elohim <S%H433><s%> is greater <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%> than man <S%H582><s%>.
Why dost thou strive <S%H7378><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against him? for he giveth not account <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of any of his matters <S%H1697><s%>.
For 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> once <S%H259><s%>, yea twice <S%H8147><s%>, yet man perceiveth <S%H7789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it not.

In a dream <S%H2472><s%>, in a vision <S%H2384><s%> of the night <S%H3915><s%>, when deep <S%H8639><s%> sleep falleth <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8800><s%> upon men <S%H582><s%>, in slumberings <S%H8572><s%> upon the bed <S%H4904><s%>;
Then he openeth <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ears <S%H241><s%> of men <S%H582><s%>, and sealeth <S%H2856><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their instruction <S%H4561><s%>,
That he may withdraw <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8687><s%> man <S%H120><s%> from his purpose <S%H4639><s%>, and hide <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> pride <S%H1466><s%> from man <S%H1397><s%>.
He keepeth back <S%H2820><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the pit <S%H7845><s%>, and his life <S%H2416><s%> from perishing <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%> by the sword <S%H7973><s%>.

He is chastened <S%H3198><s%> <S%H8717><s%> also with pain <S%H4341><s%> upon his bed <S%H4904><s%>, and the multitude <S%H7230><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7379><s%> of his bones <S%H6106><s%> with strong <S%H386><s%> pain:
So that his life <S%H2416><s%> abhorreth <S%H2092><s%> <S%H8765><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, and his soul <S%H5315><s%> dainty <S%H8378><s%> meat <S%H3978><s%>.

His flesh <S%H1320><s%> is consumed away <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, that it cannot be seen <S%H7210><s%>; and his bones <S%H6106><s%> that were not seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8795><s%> stick out <S%H8192><s%> <S%H8795><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H8205><s%>.
Yea, his soul <S%H5315><s%> draweth near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the grave <S%H7845><s%>, and his life <S%H2416><s%> to the destroyers <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

If there <S%H3426><s%> be a messenger <S%H4397><s%> with him, an interpreter <S%H3887><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> among a thousand <S%H505><s%>, to shew <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> unto man <S%H120><s%> his uprightness <S%H3476><s%>:

Then he is gracious <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, and saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Deliver <S%H6308><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him from going down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to the pit <S%H7845><s%>: I have found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a ransom <S%H3724><s%>.
His flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall be fresher <S%H7375><s%> <S%H8738><s%> than a child's <S%H5290><s%>: he shall return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the days <S%H3117><s%> of his youth <S%H5934><s%>:

He shall pray <S%H6279><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%H433><s%>, and he will be favourable <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him: and he shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> with joy <S%H8643><s%>: for he will render <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto man <S%H582><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

He looketh <S%H7789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon men <S%H582><s%>, and if any say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and perverted <S%H5753><s%> <S%H8689><s%> that which was right <S%H3477><s%>, and it profited <S%H7737><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me not;

He will deliver <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from going <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into the pit <S%H7845><s%>, and his life <S%H2416><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the light <S%H216><s%>.
Lo, all these things worketh <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8799><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> oftentimes <S%H6471><s%> <S%H7969><s%> with man <S%H1397><s%>,
To bring back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the pit <S%H7845><s%>, to be enlightened <S%H215><s%> <S%H8736><s%> with the light <S%H216><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.
Mark well <S%H7181><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O I-yov <S%H347><s%>, hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me: hold thy peace <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

If thou hast <S%H3426><s%> any thing to say <S%H4405><s%>, answer <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me: speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%>, for I desire <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to justify <S%H6663><s%> <S%H8763><s%> thee.
If not, hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me: hold thy peace <S%H2790><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, and I shall teach <S%H502><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.
